Reviews.Title: 19 inch LCD digital TV
Reviews.Author: Digital Artist
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small digital TV to use in the bedroom with an indoor antenna, and purchased 14" CRT model at Walmart that just did not cut the mustard. I returned it for the 19" Sanyo LCD model.Installation was fast and easy. Take it out of the box, plug it in, attach antenna, power on, and the set detects the type of antenna connection and off it goes scanning for TV stations without further ado.It even comes with a manual.The remote is uncluttered and  simple to use. I was comfortable with it very quickly.The digital pictures are crisp clear and a pleasure to watch. The analog pictures were not that good, but that depends on your antenna and location. I used a table top powered antenna from Radio Shack that works fine.I gave the TV a four star rating because I have not had it long enough to give a full evaluation. I wrote this simply because there were no other evaluations, and I want to provide at least some feed back for those that are considering this product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Dorm Room
Reviews.Author: F. J. Procaccini
Reviews.Content: I have this TV in my small dorm room and it is perfect.  The reason I gave it 4 stars is because the sound quality isn't the best but what can you expect in this small package.  My xbox 360 looks amazing on it with the HD inputs.  The price isn't bad either.  It's easy to move around and fit in small places.  Definitely recommended for a college student, trust me, I am one.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: K. Hinton "starrynight"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV at Wal-Mart, for the bedroom.  The first one lasted a week and then quit working on me.  Did a few funny things and then just stopped responding.Customer Service was very helpful, though, and told me to take it back to the store and exchange it.  Wal-Mart was also very helpful, they exchanged the tv with no problem.Both the day I bought it and the day I exchanged it, I noticed that these tv's were just "walking" out of the store.  They seem to be very popular.The picture is very clear, crisp, and bright.  The audio is great.  I like that I can hook up my computer if I want.  The television is easy to set up, easy to use, easy to move, and light (I could move it while I was eight months pregnant).

Reviews.Title: My last Sanyo product
Reviews.Author: G. Miller
Reviews.Content: This makes the third Sanyo product I have owned and will definitely be my last.  I bought this TV for the kitchen to replace a 13" GE TV/VCR and this TV appealed to me because it not only had a larger screen but also because it could fit in the same place the 13" TV had before it.  At first everything went great.  I had no problems hooking the TV up and searching for programming.  Then a few weeks later the unit reset itself and all channels were deleted.  I found it rather odd and just had it auto search for programming again.  It worked fine for a few more days when it reset itself to the factory settings yet again.  This was getting to be a bit annoying but I reprogrammed it yet again.  Around the same time I also noticed a stuck pixel on the right hand side of the screen.  It isn't noticeable when I'm watching the TV but when the screen is black there's this highly noticeable fuchsia  dot on the screen.  I called Sanyo and the support rep said he would call back with a list of places in my area that can repair the TV.  That has been roughly 3 months ago and I'm yet to get that call.In conclusion, this TV is not worth the price with the quality of the product and the quality of customer support offered by Sanyo.  I will be replacing this unit as soon as possible.

Reviews.Title: doesnt work after only 2 years
Reviews.Author: meg "meg"
Reviews.Content: this tv WORKED great. yes I needed to shout that. came home today after work and went to turn it on and nothing, makes a quick flash and nothing. Funny thing is it worked fine this morning before I left for work. So I would not buy this tv, unless you get an extended warranty and then have it replaced, or just get reimbursed. I purchased this tv 2 years ago when it was new, at walmart. Should have got that extended warranty, also should've listen to the hearsay about Sanyo. junk. booo

Reviews.Title: Really Great Hdtv the picture quality is beautiful
Reviews.Author: Time
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv from walmart on friday the 7th of january 2011 i was actually going to buy another tv i think acer but instead say this and i think i was going to also buy another tv but i mean when something is meant to be "God" will let you know so i pick this up from walmart except the model DP19640 the thing i like the most about this tv is that you can use it has a computer monitor using the vga port or you can switch to tv and watch cable tv or you can play video games on it i have the new xbox slim 4gb and i bought an hdmi cable from here amazon cheap almost 5 dollars and hook it to this tv with my xbox man the picture is incredible and the sound i mean this is hdtv to the maximum i mean the picture clarity is really great even when watching tv i get digit channels from my cable network free this is a great tv you can save money by using it as a computer monitor,watch tv,switch to hdmi for your xbox 360 or ps3 and component cable this is a great tv plus its 19 inch too so you can move it about easily this is a great tv i would definetly recommand and get a new one too if i had too the same exact brand nothing different same size everything. A++++++

Reviews.Title: wonderful for the price
Reviews.Author: M. H Shamp
Reviews.Content: I love this TV! I bought it at Walmart after studying all the 19" TVs there carefully. There is a cheaper model, but it looks BAD. All fuzzy. This is the second cheapest there and looks so much better. Picture is clear, screen light is good though a bit darker than the others. Light to carry too, only 8 pounds. I brought it home and it looks better yet in my house!Setup is very simple. You snap on the base, screw in two screws, plug in power cord. I then connected the DVD player to it and played movies. Looks good. It does have the option of controlling screen size, that is, you can play stuff with full screen or wide screen. (Some people don't bother with this, so their TV pictures look stretched.)Now my son is playing Xbox on it, and the picture looks great! much better than it does on my old CRT 19" TV (even though that one isn't bad). The speakers sound rather decent too.Anyway, my son is very happy, and so am I!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Paul Croasdale
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for use in my dorm room. great picture, great sound, and easy hook-up to all my dvd inputs and sound outputs.All around great product, especially for someone on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Worked Great for me
Reviews.Author: Ttf "Book Collector"
Reviews.Content: Maybe I should have given it A four-star rating, but i've had this TV for 5 years. it was a return item from walmart so it was hugely discounted. The only problem i have is when i leave a scene on pause for too long or leave the the menu screen on (falling asleep during a movie) and it stays on all night. The last scene shown is burned into the TV screen for approx an hour. But that's my own fault for simply not turning it off. Easily avoidable.

Reviews.Title: stopped working after 2 yrs.
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: Ours died 2 years to the day after we purchased it, too.  I am so tired of expensive things being made to stop functioning in a short period of time.

Reviews.Title: Not That Great....
Reviews.Author: Y. Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on the high reviews at [...] 2 days ago, but the more I try this out, the more disappointed with this I get....When I firt connected this TV to a multi-directional, amplified antenna, & tried the  auto-scan function, this thing actually picked up several more channels that any other HDTVs(a Sony, Insignia, & a Visio) that I've tried out so far, but I've quickly come to realize that the reception on this TV just isn't even half as stable as those of the other HDTVs....  (In fact, abt. half of the channels that have been detected on this TV don't put out any visuals or audios....)Also, the skin tone of the people appearing on most channels appear too reddish even when I set the TV's Tint feature all the way to the end of the Greenish Tint's side, & the skin tones of the people on a same program sometimes fluctuate quite a bit depending on the cameras used....Also, some of the buttons on the TV's remote just don't respond until I press'em harder than I'm used to with any button on any other remote that I've ever used in my lifetime, & bcs. the channel & vol. control buttons have raised <, >, ... type symbols on the buttons themselves, the buttons just don't feel smooth like those on any other remote....

Reviews.Title: T.v. didn't work! It was sent in pieces.
Reviews.Author: Joanne Barber
Reviews.Content: The t.v. came to me damaged. It was apart from the stand and there were no screws. Plus I couldn't get a picture. I contacted the seller and he agreed to pay back my money But now that he sees how the t.v. was sent to me he isn't giving me back the money. I will fight this. Be ware of this seller.

Reviews.Title: Decent Little TV
Reviews.Author: Vicky Gall
Reviews.Content: The TV is great for the price and has held up better than I expected. I would recommend it to someone looking for a cheap TV for the bedroom or kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo 19 HDTV DP19648
Reviews.Author: EPP
Reviews.Content: Set was great until our cable company made us switch to digital.Now there is one BIG problem:The set cannot split digital sub-channels.when we want to go to channel 67-12, for example,we have to enter 67 on the remote, then manually go up thru each sub channel to get to 67-12.A bought a remote that had a DASH function for entering sub-channels,which the factory remote does not have, but that didn't work either.The book says, if you delete any sub-channel, then ALL the sub channels wil be deleted.So we can't eliminate unwanted sub-channels.This mades for a very awkward use of the set.BOOO.

Reviews.Title: 18.5" Sanyo LCD
Reviews.Author: gerald7222
Reviews.Content: I have no idea of the how it will look on the RV I bought it for, It is still been work on and I need to have the t.v. to fit a hole that use to be octupided by a 13". will see how it turn out.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.5" Diagonal LCD [19" Class], Wide screen 16:9 Aspect Ratio ,
Native panel resolution: 1440 x 900 pixels(WXGA+) , Wide viewing angles: 160-degrees, Integrated Digital Tuner. Auto Channel Search Setup
Picture Settings: Brightness, Sharpness, Contrast, Color, Tint, Color Temp, Backlight , Two built-in speakers
Stereo & Digital Audio , Audio: Bass/Treble/Balance, Stereo/SAP/Mono, Surround On/Off, Language, HDMI,
Trilingual Menus: English, Spanish, French , Closed Caption Compliant, Sleep Timer up to 2 hours
Two component (Y-Pb-Pr with R/L audio) inputs, One S-video input (overrides composite input),
One composite input (V,L/R), One coaxial digital audio output , One fixed analog audio out (R/L), One RF input (analog/digital antenna in)
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo DP19657B 18.5-inch [19 inch Class] LCD HDTV with Digital Tuner
